title: Blinkit, Zepto pilot returns, exchanges to ace fashion ecommerce
description: Quick commerce is spreading its wings to include consumer electronics, lifestyle, and fashion in its scope. The main players in the space are looking to address one of the biggest pain points of online fashion shoppingâ€”returns and exchanges.
content: As quick commerce firms expand further into delivering apparel and lifestyle products in 10 minutes, they are looking to address one of the biggest pain points of online fashion shopping - returns and exchanges.
